= Introduction =
Interpretation of IGRT shift information is not the easiest thing in the world.  Elekta's Mosaiq, for one, has had a terrible time defining a coherent interpretation of shifts that is robust irrespective of online device conventions, regional settings, and general user error

= Details =
Maybe the problem is that we are expecting people to be more adept at spatial reasoning than the actually are.
